Sentencas: La1-xSrxCo0.25Fe0.O-75(3-delta) is known as one of the best cathode materials for permeation membranes and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation energies in Sr-doped complex perovskites: ab initio thermodynamic study

Sentencas: Optimization of its chemical composition is a challenging problem.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation energies in Sr-doped complex perovskites: ab initio thermodynamic study

Sentencas: One of the key properties is concentration of oxygen vacancies, which is controlled by their formation energies.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation energies in Sr-doped complex perovskites: ab initio thermodynamic study

Sentencas: Ab initio calculations were employed in order to study the formation of oxygen vacancies in La1-xSrxCo0.25Fe0.O-75(3-delta) perovskites by varying the Sr content from x = 12.5% to 50%.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation energies in Sr-doped complex perovskites: ab initio thermodynamic study

Sentencas: The formation energies were obtained for different stoichiometries as functions of temperature and oxygen partial pressure.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation energies in Sr-doped complex perovskites: ab initio thermodynamic study

Sentencas: For this purpose we calculated the phonon frequencies in the solid phase and the chemical potential of oxygen.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation energies in Sr-doped complex perovskites: ab initio thermodynamic study

Sentencas: We have shown that the phonon contribution to the free energy of formation becomes increasingly important in La1-xSrxCo0.25Fe0.O-75(3-delta) not only with rising temperature but also with rising Sr content.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation energies in Sr-doped complex perovskites: ab initio thermodynamic study

Sentencas: We find that the formation energies decrease significantly with increasing Sr content due to the phonon contribution.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation energies in Sr-doped complex perovskites: ab initio thermodynamic study

Sentencas: A simple explanation is proposed for the increasing role of phonons in the oxygen vacancy formation energies on the basis of phonon mode changes in comparison to defect-free materials.
Titulo: Oxygen vacancy formation energies in Sr-doped complex perovskites: ab initio thermodynamic study

Sentencas: A careful analysis of the experimental results from the literature is also presented.
